::Zardus/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

DevilDuer nods at Zardus' orders, walking out of the Alliance base and 
heading for the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus nods as Dark One walks out. He looks at Zergling.

"Yes, Zergling gets to fight. Now go," he says.

Zardus stands up, looking at Reptilica, Bloodystrike, and Perndabot.

"Let's go," he says, the four of them flying out of the Alliance base and 
heading toward Iron Raptor's position.
